title: Mexican Kitchen
name: Alondra Montero
slogan: Cooking done with care is an act of love

offers.description: Mon-Fri : Al Pastor, Cabeza, Carnitas, Pollo Asado, Carne Asada (includes Beans, potatoes and Tortillas
BREAKFAST(Mon-Fri) : Ham & Egg, Chorizo & Egg, Bacon & Egg, Machaca & Egg, Chilaquiles, Huevos Rancheros
SALADS (Mon-Fri): Chicken Taco Salad, Shrimp Salad, Steak Taco Salad, Enchiladas Amigos, Enchiladas Verdes
Pasta: Bolognese, Marinara, Carbonara, Papalina, Pesto (Includes Chicken, steak, olives and veggies
Soups: Minestrone, Smoked Mushroom, Smoked Chicken, Prawn Soup, Beef Soup
Sandwich: Turkey Dagwood, Ham and Salami, Tuna Italian, Genoa Salami, Roast Beef

title: Arabic Kitchen
name: Nadia
slogan: Home cooked meal is a labour of love

offers.description: Chicken Shawarma, Beef Shawarma, Kafta, Shish Tawaouk, Lamb Chops
Spinach Manakeesh, Cheese Manakeesh, Salmon with Rice, Falafel wrap, Tabliyeh Saj Shawarma
Lentil Soup, Arnabeet, Kebbeh, Rakakat, Yalla Special

title: Indian Kitchen
name: Tanvir
slogan: Food is not just Energy, It is experience

offers.description: Breakfast: (Mon- Fri): Stuffed Indian flatbread with veggies
Lunch: Palak Paneer, Malai Kofta, Chickpeas Stew, Mixed Veggie, Butter Chicken
Fried Rice, Pav Bhaji, Kabab Wrap, Masala Dosa, Spicy Mushroom

title: Pancake lovers
name: Emma
slogan: Rise and shine It is a pancake time

offers.description: (Mon-Sun): Fruit Mix, Chocolate, Jam, Caramel, Chessecake, Buttermilk, Blueberry
(Mon-Fri): Fruit Mix, Chocolate, Jam, Caramel, Chessecake

title: Fruit Salad
name: William
slogan: Fruit is Nature's candy. Enjoy it!!

offers.description: Large: Mix Fruit Bowl with yogurt and Honey on side
Medium:  Mix Fruit Bowl with yogurt and Honey on side
Small: Mix Fruit Bowl with yogurt and Honey on side
